title: Know a DC medical professional helping with the Covid efforts with a housing issue? (Can’t go home to family for fear of infecting them, for example.)
text:
My Airbnb (which is actually a legal 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment) is empty until June and I’m happy to host someone from my community who is giving back to my community at no cost.

Update to add location:  NE DC near Gallaudet/Union Market.

2nd update: I’ve found an ER nurse who will be staying through April 25 but I’m committed to offering it through June 1 if anyone else has a need!
